predicate.note: Frames file for 'undo' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.

example.name: transitive
example.text: Despite warnings [*ICH*-1] from such leaders as former Federal Reserve Board Chairman William McChesney Martin that unfixed commissions would undo the industry , the SEC in September 1973 said [0] full competition must start May l , 1975 .

example.name: passive
example.text: The joint venture is being undone [*-1] , with McCall 's magazine being sold [*-2] last summer to the New York Times Co. 's Magazine Group for about $ 80 million [*U*] , and Time Warner agreeing [*-3] to sell back its 50 % interest in Working Woman and Working Mother to Mr. Lang .
